DOC.brief_summary: The primary study objective , time , follow 5 year post implant safety already enrolled subject treat UniFit Aorto-uni-iliac ( AUI ) Endoluminal Stent Graft ( `` study device '' ) repair abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAAs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Treatment Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: This phase II , single-arm , prospective study safety study device repair AAAs . The investigator identify eligible patient explain study study device placement procedure patient and/or available family member . Patients provide write informed consent evaluate study eligibility within time period identify Duration Treatment . Patients confirm eligible , base screen assessment finding , enrol study . After hospital discharge , patient attend study center visit 30 day , 6 month , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 year post-procedure follow-up evaluation .
DOC.criteria: Patient 18 year age old Patient AAA meet one follow criterion : 1 . Aneurysm diameter great 4.5 cm , less 4.5 cm rapid expansion 2 . The aneurysm saccular configuration potential rupture increase exhibited dissection potential rupture , compromise flow , vital structure The vessel immediately proximal distal lesion capable accommodate study device The access artery diameter profile artery capable study device delivery . Patient proximal distal neck length great equal 1.0 cm Patient willing able comply followup regime . Patient provide write informed consent . Patient aortic diameter great 36 mm . Patients ASA score less 3 deem low risk Investigator open surgical repair . Patient indispensable inferior mesenteric artery . Patient distal land zone < 2 cm length > 16 mm diameter Patient iliac artery whose tortuosity prevent passage introducer catheter . If female , patient pregnant Patient life expectancy less two year . Patient allergy study device material Patient coagulopathy bleed disorder Patient contrast medium anticoagulation drug contraindicate Patient uncontained rupture aneurysm . Patient active systemic localize groin infection Patient connective tissue disease . Patient GFR < 30 ml/min/1.73m2 Patient circumferential mural thrombus implantation site . Patient candidate bifurcate endovascular graft . Patient aortic trunk angle great 90Â° .
